title: Tip Calculator
description: The application calculates the tip based on a bill amount and a preset or custom percentage. It includes a reset functionality.

title: Responsive Hamburger Menu
description: A three-level menu that turns into a hamburger menu on mobile devices.

title: Currency Converter
description: A currency converter that uses an external API for conversion rates. It can work offline using locally stored conversion rates.

title: Who Pays the Bill
description: The app allows users to add participants and randomly select who will pay the restaurant bill.

title: Coming Soon
description: This is a simple page indicating that the site is under construction and will open soon. It includes a message and a countdown timer for launch.

title: Website Layout
description: A basic website layout that includes a simple page structure with a header, content sections, sidebar, and footer. An example for responsive design.

title: Back to Top Button
description: A simple app that adds a 'Back to Top' button to quickly return to the top of the page when the user scrolls down.

title: IT Company Website
description: A website dedicated to an IT company, including information about services, team, previous projects, and a contact form.
